Y-axis titled 'algorithm' for a discrete scale with 15 values: (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed, (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed LoopFissionIndexArithmetic, (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed LoopFission, (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed OuterLoopUnrolled, (JohT) inputPerKernelValue Transposed InnerLoopUnrolled, ending with (wilczek) Outer-Loop Vectorization
